thread.title: H.R. Pufnstuf, child of the '60s, visits Nickelodeon show
thread.title_full: H.R. Pufnstuf, child of the '60s, visits Nickelodeon show

title: H.R. Pufnstuf, child of the '60s, visits Nickelodeon show
text:
> Entertainment H.R. Pufnstuf, child of the '60s, visits Nickelodeon show This photo provided by Nickelodeon shows Marty Krofft. H.R. Pufnstuf, the title character of the 1969-71 children’s series will appear on an episode of Nickelodeon’s new preschool series “Mutt & Stuff,” the cable channel said Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. “Mutt & Stuff” is produced by Sid and Marty Krofft, the same brothers who produced “H.R. Pufnstuf.” (Robert Voets/Nickelodeon via AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
